submitRequirements_zh: 需要提供功能建议或bug报告
submitRequirements_en: Feature suggestions or bug reports required
rating_zh: 简洁的在线音乐播放器，界面美观，功能基础但实用。适合作为学习项目参考，展示了现代Web音频API的使用。
rating_en: A clean online music player with beautiful interface and basic but practical features. Suitable as a learning project reference, demonstrating the use of modern Web Audio APIs.
